name: FGT Network
overview:
FGT Network is the leading on-demand consulting platform dedicated to business development in fast-growing cities (Shanghai, Bangkok, Singapore, Mumbai, New Delhi, SÃ£o Paulo, etc). FGT delivers field information & operational knowledge to help reaching these markets.

On FGT Network, experienced industry professionals (directors, managers, business owners) based in fast-growing cities share their local business expertise with European decision makers willing to expand their business.

Consultations are carried out through phone or synthetic reports. Our turnkey platform offers a secured and controlled environment, with full management of intermediation, and support on administrative & legal aspects (billing, insurance, contractualization, legal obligations).
